title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
descriptions:
Introducing our 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle Set, perfect for creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere in any space. This set includes 16 beautifully scented candles, each offering a unique fragrance to suit any mood or occasion. 

The scents included in this set are Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, Bergamot, Fig, Lavender, Lemon, Spring, Gardenia, Strawberry, Rosemary, Peppermint, Bluebell, Wood Sage & Sea Salt, Peony Cherry Blossom, and English Pear & Freesia. With such a wide variety of fragrances, there is something for everyone to enjoy.

Crafted from natural soy wax, these candles are not only environmentally friendly but also provide a clean and long-lasting burn. Each candle has a burn time of 18-20 hours, allowing you to enjoy the soothing ambiance for an extended period.

The candles are housed in elegant tin cans, making them easy to transport and perfect for gifting. The tin cans are not only recyclable but also have alternative uses such as flowerpots or home decorations, adding a touch of style to any space.

When using these candles, it is important to follow safety instructions. Keep them out of reach of children and pets when unattended to avoid accidents and fire hazards. 

This set of 16 scented candles is an ideal gift for mothers, wives, daughters, and friends. Whether you want to create a relaxing atmosphere at home or surprise your loved ones with a thoughtful present, our Aromatherapy Candle Set is the perfect choice.
